import React, {Component} from 'react'; class Checkout extends Component { state = { fname: '', lname: '', email: '', address: '', address2: '', city: '', state: '', zip: '', cc: '', exp: '', cvv: '', } onChange = (e) => { this.setState({[e.target.name]: e.target.value}) } render() { return (

Checkout


); } } export default Checkout;
